this_title: You Don't Like the Truth: 4 Days Inside Guantanamo
trans_title: 你不喜欢真相: 在关塔那摩的4天
introduction: The meeting, never seem before, of a Canadian interrogation team with a child detained at the Guantanamo Bay prison. Based on a seven hour video recording, declassified by the Supreme Court of Canada, this documentary shows the intensity of this interrogation which lasted four days. Using the surveillance camera, the film analyzes the scientific, legal and political implications of this forced dialog.
chinese_title: 你不喜欢真相: 在关塔那摩的4天
foreign_title: You Don't Like the Truth: 4 Days Inside Guantanamo
